steps.conclusion: None. All titles comply with constraints (<=5 words, no levels, no joiners, no 'course/program'), include 'International Law' as required, and 'is_language_course' is false for all. Global law topics used appropriately without jurisdiction.
None. 'english_title' matches titles, icons start with 'tabler-', descriptions are in English.

Could add a couple more relevant global subfields (e.g., International Criminal Law, International Humanitarian Law, Law of the Sea, International Environmental Law) to broaden options, though not required.
